FRC 2813, the Gear Heads are proud to present the CAD for our 2025 robot Maelstrøm!

25robot654×654 112 KB

Link to CAD

We are open to any questions and will be happy to answer.

2813 has been one of my favorite Bay Area teams for years, and I’m glad y’all could punch back to back tickets to Worlds before the end of California regionals. Amazing work all season and on Galileo this weekend.
